item.title: Drops and yelling
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

well this is a little different, what i would do is something like in npc handler - heres a brief overview
it would be like
if npc id killed {
if (misc.random(100==1){
additem(hilt);
yell(“player just got a rare drop”);
}
}

something like that, or u could do a global drop, but i think theres a chance of someone else picking it up

or… u could make like another hilt with a different id, then in your client.java
if (playerHasItem(fack hilt, 1){
deleteItem(fake hilt, 1);
addItem(real hilt, 1);
yell(“PLAYER GOT A RARE DROP”);
}

that would probaly be the best
